title: Does the draft tax law on the General Statute introduce legislation on "real personality" to combat abortion?
subtitle: The current Plan of the World Programme of Action allows for the inclusion of "unborn children" as beneficiaries of college funds, which is interpreted as an effort to legalize embryos as persons.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The 2017 tax reform plan contains language that attempts to codify fetal personality.
